sam.display
Class samJGraph

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent

                    +--diva.canvas.JCanvas
                          |
                          +--sam.display.samJGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class samJGraph
extends diva.canvas.JCanvas

A graph widget analagous to java.swing.JTree. JGraph contains a GraphModel and can be customized to render it in an application-specific way through it's GraphPane member variable.

See Also:
GraphModel, Serialized Form

setCanvasPane

public void setCanvasPane(diva.canvas.CanvasPane cp)
Set the canvas pane, but force it to be of type GraphPane. Throws an illegal argument exception if the canvas pane is anything else.

FIXME: Should this throw an exception any time it's called?
